Devoa: "A new age is upon us - and dragons will rule it from the skies!"
德沃亚: “龙族会从空中统治大地，新的时代正向我们走来！”

Devoa: "The ultimate leader is the ultimate servant, and will achieve victory over a tyrant."
德沃亚: “事事以民为先才能成为最优秀的领导，才能战胜暴君。”

Devoa: "Oh, another bad guy? How would you like me to kill them all this time?"
德沃亚: “噢，又有一个坏蛋？这次你想要我怎么干掉他们？”

Devoa: "If you will not have me, then you will die..."
"Those who cling to the past will be swallowed up by the future."
德沃亚: “执着于过去的人将被未来所吞噬。”

Devoa: "I do not fear these great beasts. They are cunning, but they do not understand the ways of war."
德沃亚: “我不害怕这些巨兽。他们虽然狡诈，但却不懂战争之道。”

Devoa: "I have nothing left but my blade. May it carve a new path for me."
德沃亚: “刀是我的所有。愿它为我开辟一条新的道路。”

Devoa: "Whaddya think, cool name, huh?! Okay well, it is descriptive, is it not?"
德沃亚: “这名字还挺酷的吧？！好吧，那它起码挺真实的描述了我，是吧？”

Devoa: "The deserts of Sayunaa could not take my life, nor will any of you fools!"
德沃亚: “萨育纳的沙漠尚且不能杀死我，更何况你们这群蝼蚁！”

Devoa: "The lost noble souls of the past live within me."
德沃亚: “我的血液里流淌着失落的贵族精神。”

Devoa: "Usually they beg for the sweet release of death."
德沃亚: “他们通常会祈求我给他们一个痛快。”

Devoa: "Men of Veridia, come to my side, and we shall purge this fallen world of filth and sin!"
德沃亚: “维尔迪亚的人快来到我的身边，让我们一同洗涤这个世界的肮脏和罪恶！”

Devoa: "Words belie actions... always seek to pierce the veil to one`s true self."
德沃亚: “言行向来不一……总是寻求揭开他人的真面目。”

Devoa: "Offense wins battles. Defense wins wars. Those who understand this shape our world."
德沃亚: “出击赢一时。防守赢一世。世界是由懂得这个真理的人塑造的。”

Devoa: "I am not impressed by these firearms. Witness the true power of the marksman."
德沃亚: “光有火器是无用。弹无虚发有大用。”

Devoa: "Fame is transient. Glory is meaningless. But wealth is joy."
德沃亚: “名气转瞬即逝。荣誉毫无意义。财富才是快乐之源”

Devoa: "I will guard the future of Veridia just as my ancestors did... whatever and whomever that may be."
德沃亚: “和我的祖祖辈辈一样，我要守护维尔迪亚的未来……天若阻我，我必逆天。”

Devoa: "If we do this right, we wont even need cumbersome armor."
德沃亚: “只要做得对，轻身上阵也无妨。”
“多纳尔，请将你最强大的敌人交给我。”

Devoa: "One must save themselves before they can save others."
"History is written by the army with the best artillery."
德沃亚: “历史是由炮兵最出色的军队所书写的。”

Devoa: "The things you've tried to bury won't remain that way!"
德沃亚: “你尝试埋葬的事物不会永远沉眠！”

Devoa: "The people of the Midlands have suffered too much."
德沃亚: “中土人民已经经受了太多的苦难”

Devoa: "What you have tried to bury will not stay buried!"
德沃亚: “你尝试埋葬的不会永远深埋！”
